attributes.action: Urge the Football Association to make Referees and Assistant Referees send off players that direct foul and abusive language at them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Urge the Football Association to make Referees and Assistant Referees send off players that direct foul and abusive language at them because it is disgraceful how many footballers do it and get away with it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
